item.description:
Let's go check out how these fine products are made.



Ryan & Wood, Inc. Distilleries is please to call Gloucester its home, turning Cape Ann into the birth place of an array of top shelf spirits. Steeped in history and tradition, Gloucester is quintessential New England, from which inspiration is drawn. Family owned and operated, they are committed to providing best-of-class products to hard working local and world travelers alike, crafting world class spirits on historic Cape Ann Ryan & Wood are the makers of Beauport Vodka, Folly Cove Rum and Knockabout Gin.

Please note: The tour will start at 11:00 am, the meetup time is at 10:45.

A few of the members have suggested that we check this out so let’s do it!!! We will take a tour of their plant and learn the process of how they make their products are made, they will answer any questions that you may have. Even if you aren’t a big drinker come out anyways and learn something new.

PARKING: In their parking lot.

COST: Free

TIME: The tour will take an hour depending on how many questions are asked.

WHERE TO MEETUP: Outside in front of the entrance.

We look forward to seeing you!
Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will be outside in front of the entrance.
item.name: Come take a tour of Ryan & Wood Distilleries!
